name: frontnet
description: Scripts to define and manage FrontNet

scripts.build-db-notes: docker run --detach --name db-notes --env MYSQL_USER=notes --env MYSQL_PASSWORD=notes12345 --env MYSQL_DATABASE=notes  --mount type=bind,src=`pwd`/notes-data,dst=/var/lib/mysql --network frontnet --env MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=w0rdw0rd mysql/mysql-server:8.0 --bind_address=0.0.0.0
scripts.prelaunch-notes: docker stop svc-notes && docker rm svc-notes
scripts.start-notes-service: npm run start-db-notes && npm run start-notes
scripts.stop-notes-service: npm run stop-db-notes && npm run stop-notes
